title: Remove logo box from splash page and app

requirements.text: Remove the logo box display from the SplashView component

quotes: take out the logo box on splash page and App

acceptanceCriteria: The logo box element is no longer visible on the splash page
The splash page layout remains visually balanced without the logo
Animations and other splash page elements continue to work correctly

requirements.text: Remove the logo box display from the main App component

quotes: take out the logo box on splash page and App

acceptanceCriteria: The logo box element is no longer visible in the main app navigation or layout
The top navigation bar and other UI elements remain properly aligned
All app views (home, manage) continue to render correctly without the logo

constraints: Do not modify the backend or data layer
Preserve all other visual elements and functionality of the splash page and app
Maintain the existing component structure and styling system
nonGoals: Modifying navigation structure beyond logo removal
